alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:21PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A cluster of thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Wallace and western Logan Counties through 445 PM MDT/545 PM CDT/... At 418 PM MDT/518 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms 7 miles west of Russell Springs, or 23 miles east of Sharon Springs, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Wallace and western Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
